raf_autenticated.popupfootercontent: The is a post-only message from Ohio Natural Gas. Please do not attempt to reply to this message. We would love to hear from you if you have questions. For assistance with your account. Please contact us via phone, e-mail customerservice@ong.com

Your gas service won't be interrupted when you switch. Ohio Natural Gas experts will handle all the details for you.
raf_autenticated.rafemailsubject: Enroll with Ohio Natural Gas and we could both get $25
raf_autenticated.rafterms: Subject to the Refer-a-Friend program ("RAF Program") rules and terms and conditions (at onlyong.com/refer). Offer limited to: (i) qualified new residential/commercial customers (each a “Referee") who use a promotion code through this RAF Program to enroll in an eligible ONG price plan (each a “RAF Referee"), and (ii) existing customers who refer one or more Referees using the RAF Program (each a “Referrer").
